title: Develop a common vision
description: Help ensure a shared vision with key stakeholders., Promote the shared vision., and 2 more actions.

title: Manage conflicts
description: Identify conflict sources., Analyze the context for the conflict., and 4 more actions.

title: Lead the project team
description: Establish expectations at the team level., Empower the team., and 5 more actions.

title: Engage stakeholders
description: Identify stakeholders., Analyze stakeholders., and 4 more actions.

title: Align stakeholder expectations
description: Categorize stakeholders., Identify stakeholder expectations., and 2 more actions.

title: Manage stakeholder expectations
description: Identify internal and external customer expectations., Align and maintain outcomes to internal and external customer expectations., and 1 more actions.

title: Develop and manage the project team
description: Assess current team structure and skills., Plan for team development., and 4 more actions.

title: Help ensure knowledge transfer
description: Identify knowledge critical to the project., Gather knowledge., and 1 more actions.

title: Develop an integrated project management plan and plan delivery
description: Assess project needs, complexity, and magnitude., Recommend a project management development approach (i.e., predictive, adaptive/agile, or hybrid management)., and 7 more actions.

title: Develop and manage project scope
description: Define scope., Obtain stakeholder agreement on project scope., and 1 more actions.

title: Help ensure value-based delivery
description: Identify value components with key stakeholders., Prioritize work based on value and stakeholder feedback., and 4 more actions.

title: Plan and manage resources
description: Define and plan resources based on requirements., Manage and optimize resource needs and availability.

title: Plan and manage procurement
description: Plan procurement., Execute a procurement management plan., and 8 more actions.

title: Plan and manage budget
description: Estimate budget., Create a project budget., and 4 more actions.

title: Plan and optimize quality of products/deliverables
description: Gather quality requirements for project deliverables., Plan quality processes and tools., and 5 more actions.

title: Plan and manage schedule
description: Prepare a schedule based on the selected development approach., Coordinate with other projects and operations., and 6 more actions.

title: Evaluate project status
description: Develop project metrics, analysis, and reconciliation., Identify and tailor needed artifacts., and 6 more actions.

title: Manage project closure
description: Obtain project stakeholder approval of project completion., Determine criteria to successfully close the project or phase., and 2 more actions.

title: Plan and manage communications
description: Determine communication needs., Create a communication plan., and 2 more actions.

title: Manage project artifacts
description: Identify needed artifacts., Help ensure artifacts are created, reviewed, updated, and documented., and 1 more actions.

title: Define and establish project governance
description: Describe and establish the structure, rules, procedures, reporting, ethics, and policies through the use of organizational process assets (OPAs)., Define success metrics., and 1 more actions.

title: Plan and manage project compliance
description: Confirm project compliance requirements (e.g., security, health and safety, sustainability, regulatory compliance)., Classify compliance categories., and 5 more actions.

title: Manage and control changes
description: Execute the change control process., Communicate the status of proposed changes., and 2 more actions.

title: Remove impediments and manage issues
description: Evaluate the impact of impediments., Prioritize and highlight impediments., and 4 more actions.

title: Plan and manage risk
description: Identify risks., Analyze risks., and 5 more actions.

title: Continuous improvement
description: Utilize lessons learned., Help ensure continuous improvement processes are updated., and 1 more actions.

title: Support organizational change
description: Assess organizational culture., Evaluate the impact of organizational change on the project and determine required actions.

title: Evaluate external business environment changes
description: Survey changes to the external business environment (e.g., regulations, technology, geopolitical, market)., Assess and prioritize the impact on project scope/backlog based on changes in the external business environment., and 1 more actions.
